title: Person entitled to enforce instrument
context: PART 3. ENFORCEMENT OF INSTRUMENTS ยง490:3-301 Person entitled to enforce instrument. &ldquo;Person entitled to enforce&rdquo; an instrument means (i) the holder of the instrument, (ii) a nonholder in possession of the instrument who has the rights of a holder, or (iii) a person not in possession of the instrument who is entitled to enforce the instrument pursuant to section 490:3-309 or 490:3-418(d). A person may be a person entitled to enforce the instrument even though the person is not the owner of the instrument or is in wrongful possession of the instrument. [L 1991, c 118, pt of ยง1]
